sourcesContent:
<style>
  .card-img{
    backgroundcolor:"red";
  }
</style>

<template >
  <v-app id="inspire" class="blue">
  
    <v-content >

      <v-container
        class="fill-height"
         >
         
      
      <v-card-img class="justify-center">
          <v-img
         src="@/assets/logo1.png" 
          max-width="100"
        max-height="200" 
             
           ></v-img>

      </v-card-img>
                <v-spacer />
        
        <v-card-text class="justify-center">
                <v-form>
                  
                  <v-text-field
                    id="login"
                    label="NOMBRE DE USUARIO"
                    validate="required"
                    name="login"
                    type="text"
                    outlined
                  />

                  <v-text-field
                    id="password"
                    label="CONTRASEÑA"
                    name="password"
                    type="password"
                    outlined
                  />
                </v-form>
             
              </v-card-text>
              
                <v-spacer />
            <v-card-actions class="justify-center">
                <v-btn color="#A20224">INICIAR SESION</v-btn>

                <v-btn text>¿SE OLVIDO SU CONTRASEÑA?</v-btn>
            </v-card-actions>
      </v-container>
    </v-content>
  </v-app>
</template>

.card-img{
  width:500px,
}


<script>
   export default {
    props: {
      source: String,
    },
  }
</script>
